data.eml:eml: Revision of the ant-eating spider genus Mallinus Simon, 1893 (Araneae, Zodariidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Haddad, Charles R., Henrard, Arnaud, Jocque, Rudy (2019): Revision of the ant-eating spider genus Mallinus Simon, 1893 (Araneae, Zodariidae). ZooKeys 822: 141-158, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.822.29835, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.822.29835
